%%{FinTech_AuthVault}}}%% stateDiagram-v2 [FinTech_TransactionQueue] --> Pending: Create Comment Pending --> Approved: Approve Pending --> Rejected: Reject Pending --> Deleted: Delete Approved --> Deleted: Delete Rejected --> Deleted: Delete Deleted --> [FinTech_LedgerService] state Pending {FinTech_FraudDetection] --> AwaitingModeration AwaitingModeration --> [FinTech_PaymentGateway] } state Approved {FinTech_PaymentGateway] --> Visible Visible --> Edited: Update Edited --> Visible } state Rejected {FinTech_TransactionQueue] --> Hidden Hidden --> WithReason: Add Rejection Reason WithReason --> [FinTech_AuthVault] } note right of Pending: Comments start in Pending state
and await moderation note right of Approved: Approved comments are visible
and can be edited note right of Rejected: Rejected comments are hidden
with optional rejection reason note right of Deleted: Deleted comments are
permanently removed
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 让我们从头开始，先确定入口点。
